flavor_text_entries.x:
It blocks opponents’ attacks with the
ice that shields its body. It uses cold air
to repair any cracks with new ice.
flavor_text_entries.y:
Using air of -150 degrees Fahrenheit, they
freeze opponents solid. They live in herds
above the snow line on mountains.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
It blocks opponents’ attacks with the
ice that shields its body. It uses cold air
to repair any cracks with new ice.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Using air of -150 degrees Fahrenheit, they
freeze opponents solid. They live in herds
above the snow line on mountains.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
They chill the air around them to −150 degrees
Fahrenheit, freezing the water in the air into ice
that they use as armor.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
This Pokémon lives in areas of frigid cold.
It secures itself to the back of an Avalugg
by freezing its feet in place.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
Lives on mountains blanketed in perennial snow. It freezes water
vapor in the air to make the ice helmet that it dons for defense.
